HOME.TEXT_FEATURE_NUMERIZE: Add, store and find your clothes easily in your digital wardrobe.
HOME.TEXT_FEATURE_CREATION: Once your clothes are digitized, create outfits, organize them and save time !
HOME.TEXT_FEATURE_CUSTOMIZED: Get daily outfit ideas based on the weather and the clothes in your closet.
HOME.TEXT_FEATURE_SUSTAINABLE: Renew your wardrobe by buying pieces from committed designers selected for you by your personal shopper.
HOME.WARDROBE_CONTROL: Take back control of your wardrobe, Buy responsibly and sustainably

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.NOT_RECEIVED: You did not receive an email ?

ACCOUNT_CREATION.TITLE: Above all
ACCOUNT_CREATION.SUB_TITLE: As your Personal Shopper, we need some essential information to know you better.
ACCOUNT_CREATION.TRUST: Have confidence, your data is safe here: 'Big Brother is not watching you here' !
ACCOUNT_CREATION.SEXE_TOOLTIP: We ask for gender in order to best suit our recommendations to your taste and style.

MORPHOLOGY.SIZE_DESCRIPTION: Select and measure your sizes for the following items

RECOMMENDATIONS.NO_RECO: Patience... your personal shopper has no more ideas for you, come back tomorrow!

FORM.HELP_PASSWORD: 8 characters minimum, 4 of which must be :
FORM.HELP_PASSWORD_CHARACTER: 1 upper case, 1 lower case, 1 number, 1 special character

FORM.INVALID_NICKNAME_CHARACTER: Only numbers, lower case letters or symbols: '-','_'.

FORM.FIRST_LETTER_UPPERCASE: The first letter must be an uppercase letter
FORM.FIRSTNAME_VALID_CHARS: Only letters and these characters are accepted: - _ / . ,

AUTHENTICATION.too-many-requests: This account has been temporarily disabled. Please wait to try again or consider changing your password
AUTHENTICATION.wrong-password: The e-mail and/or the password are not valid
AUTHENTICATION.user-not-found: The e-mail and/or the password are not valid
AUTHENTICATION.invalid-email: The e-mail entered is not valid

AUTHENTICATION.account-exists-with-different-credential: This account already exists with another way of connection

PERSONAL_SHOPPER.NO_MORE_CLOTHES: Sorry but the application has no more clothes to offer !
PERSONAL_SHOPPER.FAKE_DATA: As an indication, the clothes proposed today are used by our personal shopper to identify your tastes, they are not the final clothes proposed on Younzee.

ERROR.INPUT_UNCHANGED: The value has not been changed
ERROR.SERVER_ERROR: Oops there seems to be an error at the moment. Refreshing the page seems to be a good idea :D
